sql-map.name: FixedAssetsTOMap
sql-map.mapped-statement: INSERT INTO FIXED_ASSETS_PRODUCT (FIXED_ASSETS_ID, ASSET_TYPE, ASSET_DESC, DEPRECIATION_RATE, BRANCH_CODE, PURCHASE_DEBIT, PROVISION_DEBIT,SELLING_AC_ID, EXCESS_DEBIT,EXCESS_CREDIT,STATUS,STATUS_DT,STATUS_BY,CREATED_BY,CREATED_DT,AUTHORIZED_STATUS,AUTHORIZED_DT,AUTHORIZED_BY,DEPRECIATION,CURR_VAL_ROUND_OFF,ROUND_OFF_TYPE ) VALUES ( #assetsID:VARCHAR#, #assetType:VARCHAR#, #assetDesc:VARCHAR#, #provision:VARCHAR#, #branCode:VARCHAR#, #purchaseDebit:VARCHAR#, #provisionDebit:VARCHAR#,#sellingAcID:VARCHAR#,#nullifyingDebit:VARCHAR#,#nullifyingCredit:VARCHAR#,#status:VARCHAR#,#statusDt:DATE#, #statusBy:VARCHAR#,#createdBy:VARCHAR#,#createdDt:DATE#,#authorizedStatus:VARCHAR#,#authorizeDt:DATE#,#authorizeBy:VARCHAR#,#rdoDepYesNo:VARCHAR#,#curValRoundOff:VARCHAR#,#roundOffType:VARCHAR# )

UPDATE FIXED_ASSETS_PRODUCT SET ASSET_TYPE = #assetType:VARCHAR#, ASSET_DESC = #assetDesc:VARCHAR#, DEPRECIATION_RATE = #provision:VARCHAR#, CURR_VAL_ROUND_OFF = #curValRoundOff:VARCHAR#, ROUND_OFF_TYPE = #roundOffType:VARCHAR#, PURCHASE_DEBIT = #purchaseDebit:VARCHAR#, PROVISION_DEBIT = #provisionDebit:VARCHAR#, SELLING_AC_ID = #sellingAcID:VARCHAR#, STATUS = #status:VARCHAR#, EXCESS_DEBIT =#nullifyingDebit:VARCHAR#, EXCESS_CREDIT = #nullifyingCredit:VARCHAR#, AUTHORIZED_STATUS = #authorizedStatus:VARCHAR#, AUTHORIZED_BY = #authorizeBy:VARCHAR#, AUTHORIZED_DT = #authorizeDt:DATE#, DEPRECIATION = #rdoDepYesNo:VARCHAR# WHERE FIXED_ASSETS_ID = #assetsID:VARCHAR#
UPDATE FIXED_ASSETS_PRODUCT SET STATUS = #status:VARCHAR#, STATUS_BY = #statusBy:VARCHAR#, STATUS_DT = #statusDt:DATE# WHERE FIXED_ASSETS_ID = #assetsID:VARCHAR#
SELECT * FROM FIXED_ASSETS_PRODUCT WHERE FIXED_ASSETS_ID = #FIXED_ASSETS_ID:VARCHAR# AND STATUS != 'DELETED'
UPDATE FIXED_ASSETS_PRODUCT SET AUTHORIZED_STATUS = #STATUS:VARCHAR#, AUTHORIZED_BY = #AUTH_BY:VARCHAR#, AUTHORIZED_DT = #AUTH_DT:DATE# WHERE FIXED_ASSETS_ID = #FIXED_ASSETS_ID:VARCHAR#
SELECT FIXED_ASSETS_ID,ASSET_TYPE,AUTHORIZED_STATUS FROM FIXED_ASSETS_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS!='DELETED' AND BRANCH_CODE=#BRANCH_CODE:VARCHAR#
SELECT FIXED_ASSETS_ID,ASSET_TYPE,ASSET_DESC FROM FIXED_ASSETS_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS!='DELETED' AND AUTHORIZED_STATUS IS NULL AND BRANCH_CODE=#BRANCH_CODE:VARCHAR#
SELECT FIXED_ASSETS_ID,ASSET_TYPE,ASSET_DESC,AUTHORIZED_STATUS FROM FIXED_ASSETS_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS!='DELETED' AND BRANCH_CODE=#BRANCH_CODE:VARCHAR#
SELECT FIXED_ASSETS_ID,ASSET_TYPE,ASSET_DESC FROM FIXED_ASSETS_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS!='DELETED' AND AUTHORIZED_STATUS IS NULL AND BRANCH_CODE=#BRANCH_CODE:VARCHAR# AND STATUS_BY != #USER_ID:VARCHAR#
SELECT ASSET_TYPE FROM FIXED_ASSETS_PRODUCT WHERE ASSET_TYPE=#ASSET_TYPE:VARCHAR#
